text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse We had the greatest economy the world had ever seen as measured by any economic metric until COVID19 partially denigrated our success. We must hold China accountable with additional punitive COVID19 related retribution tariffs! Repatriate jobs& production back to the US !!!
